casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Sidney E. BROWN. No. 159P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Michael K. Lands, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of March 2006 by Defendant for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."
